website_summaries.verdict: If you want a pegboard made with Wall Control's trusted quality in a versatile size, this is the one to pick. Just like the brand's other products, it's crafted to last for life.
pros: Mid-level size that's practical for numerous purposes
Several colors to pick with powder-coated finishes
cons: Peg hooks have to be purchased separately

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy. Arrived quickly and with no damage
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy. Arrived quickly and with no damage. Love the cheerful red. Good quality paint job on the panels and accessories. I will be using a total of six of these panels in my quilting studio to hold thread, fabric, supplies, templates, etc. Will have what I need at hand, on display and attractive. So, when I am "sent to my room" (LMAO) I will have a cheerful organized chaos as I create my works of art!
customer_reviews.author: S. Sherrouse

customer_reviews.title: Research this first
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to use this as a board to hang keys on in my service department. Just something simple but nice looking for a new shop. You have to get the special hooks with these. I needed just plain old 2 inch hooks...the kits you have to get are expensive. Would have been better off getting cheaper peg board. Look at the pictures of this before buying and make sure it serves the purpose of what you need, and research the hook kits before buying.
customer_reviews.author: Kk92

customer_reviews.title: Metal Peg Board that accepts both slots or regular peg board accessories
customer_reviews.text: This is made out of metal & has both the regular peg board holes or the slots. This does not match the 4 panel peg board I have but I bought it because it is the right size to fit between the wall and the end of my plastic peg board. On the picture this is the left panel w/ the drills. If starting from scratch I think I prefer this metal one over the plastic because of the material plus the fact that you can use both the slots or the regular peg board accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Allan C. Estrella

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: I did not read the description well enough, so I will order another for decorative purpose; I already have another use for this one. The edges are curved under to allow for pegboard hooks to go through. I will reorder if I find another place for this, it is so much better than the fiberboard pegboard.
customer_reviews.author: cinbtown

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my tiny kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use in my tiny NYC kitchen to hang pans & utensils and it has worked beautifully. It is sturdy, easy to install, and even came with extra screws & drywall anchors. However it does *not* come with hooks - those have to be purchased separately.
customer_reviews.author: trp9004

customer_reviews.title: poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: this is the 2nd one of these I bought, the 1st one was completely destroyed in transit and I had to return it , the 2nd was also bent but I was able to straighten it out, they need to have better packaging to protect the metal pegboard from being bent or twisted. On the bright side I really like the pegboard I have it installed in my kitchen with my cast iron skillets on it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love all of wall control products...helps me organize all my frequently used tools and stuff off my work bench and keeps them in arms reach in an organized manner. The only issue i have is the condition the panel arrived in. Boxed was pretty banged up and a corner was dented.....i just tweaked it back as straight as i could and mounted it. Can't really tell it was bent in the rear corner now but still.....i wish they would pack it better so there's no damage....hence the 3 stars....otherwise it would have been a 5 star experience
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So organized
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this to hang my pots, pans & lids. Very sturdy metal. I bought two panels previously & just added a third. Some of the hooks were hard to get in & out, but not most of them. Once you have it set where you want them, then no problem. The one improvement I would make for my needs is to have all slits & no holes for hangers. That way I could fit more pots on the panels.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Easy install, better packaging would help prevent damage
customer_reviews.text: The installation is fairly easy. Two people may be required depending on where you're mounting it. My only complaint would be the packaging. The unit I received was in a thin cardboard Bax that had obviously been abused by the carrier. The left side of the pegboard was bent along with the corners. I was able to bend it back into shape enough to mount it to the wall but some extra packaging probably would've prevented the damage.
customer_reviews.author: Frank A.

customer_reviews.title: Small but served its purpose
customer_reviews.text: In the end my project turned out great. The only issue I had with this was with shipping. Came on time, but the box and board were really beat up. The board is dented in a few places and it was definitely laughable watching me flatten this thing back out. I’m pretty impatient or else I would’ve returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Mack

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly in our kitchen for holding pots and pans ...
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly in our kitchen for holding pots and pans. Only negative- it says it’s magnetic but it’s not magnetic enough to hold anything.
customer_reviews.author: Kira

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing, I bought 4 of these panels
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing, I bought 4 of these panels. Heavy duty that will last a lifetime. Use the pieces that they also make for your items that you hang. Plus how cool to have a orange colored peg board. Would buy again in heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas Favors

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to build my son’s nerf gun rack. It looks really nice. I love the color and it is well built. I would totally buy more for my scrapbook table for my next project.
customer_reviews.author: R. Nakamura

customer_reviews.title: Nice a simple. Nothing fancy, just what you need.
customer_reviews.text: Went up on the wall, no problem, and now we have a nice pots and pans area on the wall of the kitchen. K.I.S.S. - Keep it stupid simple. They've done this, and it's a nice product because of it.
customer_reviews.author: Alex M.

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Metal! (In a good way)
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought two of these for a closet that needed organizing, and now own six as I upgraded my tool storage area. Rock-solid and in their way beautiful for those of us with a decorator's eye. Not all utilitarian products need to look that way! I highly recommend, especially above board-based pegboard, which tends to fray with use.
customer_reviews.author: Musidorus

customer_reviews.title: Unexpected purchase
customer_reviews.text: I only purchased this item because I was looking for a way to organize my hats. It was easy to install with the proper tools, and made a great purchase for hanging my hats, with assorted pegs purchased separately.
customer_reviews.author: oddlad

customer_reviews.title: Peg board super sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Better support than peg board. Good weight for shelves, drills, and utility baskets.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin  Coble Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: Easy install.
customer_reviews.text: Should have ordered the double pack. I have too many tools. 🤔
customer_reviews.author: Eric Stephen Berger MD PS

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: U can't go wrong with this product it's quality made and designed..
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Grimins

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and look great
customer_reviews.text: I really like these panels. Very easy to install and look much better than most other pegboard type products. Very sturdy and hold tools well.
customer_reviews.author: Rex

customer_reviews.title: Metal peg wall panels
customer_reviews.text: Work really well, but a little pricey. Would be nice if they also came 32"x 24" in size too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, easy to mount
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, easy to mount. However, one has significant damage on corner and there was no damage on shipping carton. Otherwise I would give five stars.
customer_reviews.author: JodyMDLR

customer_reviews.title: paint looks good nice shiny blue
customer_reviews.text: Solid material, paint looks good nice shiny blue. Invest in the wall control kit for all the hangers and accessories for the peg board. The cheep home depot ones dont cut it. These have a secure tab when inserting the wall control brand ones.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew D.

customer_reviews.title: Warning: you have to use WallControl's accessories!
customer_reviews.text: I like the peg board, but didn't realize you have to use Wall Control's hooks - and they are pricey. Regular peg board accessories won't fit!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah W.

customer_reviews.title: Expensive
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the high price I paid. Now they are two for that price!
customer_reviews.author: Notlikingmuch

customer_reviews.title: good for use as a wiper rack
customer_reviews.text: looks bigger on here than physically.. i expected 2 boards but on recieved 1. my perception on the promotion
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: BUY. AA
customer_reviews.text: Great wall Organization system, Has both slots and holes, comes in different colors, ALOT of different attachments for every need. I highly recommend this system.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: make sure you put these up in the right direction ...
customer_reviews.text: make sure you put these up in the right direction. unlike old fashioned pegboard, the hooks on this won't work if the board is upside down or sideways
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Ann Lepoff

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A great alternate for standard peg board units. Good looking unit with lots of possibilities.
customer_reviews.author: Monte A Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Peg Wall
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my sons room to hold his Nerf guns!!!! Definitely didn’t disappoint and his room looks so cool! He loves his wall of Nerf Guns!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Lundy

customer_reviews.title: Would be perfect if slightly wider, say 20"
customer_reviews.text: Would be perfect if slightly wider, say 20". Sturdy and heavy material. Red color is attractive and very visible.
customer_reviews.author: Olga Tumanova

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with how they look on the wall and amount ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought two. Very happy with how they look on the wall and amount of hooks! Buy extra hook things though if you have a lot of tools.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great 👍
customer_reviews.text: Great pegboard very sturdy definitely would recommend to a friend
customer_reviews.author: jonathan pierce

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: only thing better would be if they offered a magnetic version
customer_reviews.author: rtp

customer_reviews.title: One of the best things I've purchased for my craft/sewing room
customer_reviews.text: One of the best things I've purchased for my craft/sewing room. Keeps all of my rulers organized and easily accessible.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was after
customer_reviews.text: Great peg board. Huge improvement on the old school stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Darryl J Macres

customer_reviews.title: So much better than regular pegboard
customer_reviews.text: So much better than regular pegboard! Easy to install, as long as your wall studs are spaced properly. Wall control products really cleaned up the look of my garage!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Carter

customer_reviews.title: I have two of these, my kitchen is very ...
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these, my kitchen is very small and not storage space. I use these to hang my pots and pans and some large cooking spoons, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Geri Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and they look great.
customer_reviews.text: I like how standard hooks will work as well as the specialty slot hooks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pay $7 more and get Wall Control 30P3232GN from the same seller (amazon) and get 2 of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Donnie Blosser

customer_reviews.title: Nice finish and came well packaged
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for about several different products. Nice finish and came well packaged
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Miller

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and affordable
customer_reviews.text: I used this at home for tools and at work for product display. I’ve put lots of weight on it with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Ryland

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Pegboard
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for my small kitchen. I hang cooking utensils that I use daily and they are in easy reach. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: W. Vitagliano

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: It was absolutely perfect. Easy to hang and looks amazingI will be ordering more...
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie L Gauthier

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product that lives up to its description. Easy install and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: DoggyDad

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: works great. Standard peg board hooks work with it. Blue matches my matco box very well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install for people with basic knowledge of tools/construction. Very solid, well made.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan B.

customer_reviews.title: Does what's supposed to do, no fuzz.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, happy with the purchase, have had it for too short time to attest for it's durability.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Tomas Ignacio

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for exterior use and being magnetic works great for magnets holding paperwork and others.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works very well and the red really brightens up the garage
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for me! Bought it to go with others I have purchased. I would recommend it...very easy to install/hang!
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Panels came with extensive damage to all edges. I ...
customer_reviews.text: Panels came with extensive damage to all edges. I had to put them up, but I believe I should be compensated for paying for damaged goods.
customer_reviews.author: chaja

customer_reviews.title: Wall Control Pegboard is AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: I could not be happier with my Wall Control Pegboard. It works exactly as advertised. I have recommended it to several of my friends. If I had more wall space, I would order more. Was easy to install, is very sturdy, and is a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L Tee Jr

customer_reviews.title: Bright color and sturdy metal.
customer_reviews.text: Looks very cool in my room. Can hang very heavy items from it. sturdy metal
customer_reviews.author: LoganB

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Very nice quality and fast shipping. Bought more!!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Amos

product_meta.title: Wall Control Pegboard 32in x 16in Black Metal Pegboard Tool Board Panel
product_meta.description: Color:BlackThe Wall Control Pegboard 32in Tall x 16in Wide Black Metal Pegboard Tool Board Panel is Durable, Versatile, and Attractive. This Wall Control Pegboard Panel is constructed from 20 Gauge Steel and is over 10 times stronger than conventional pegboard. The Metal Pegboard Tool Board Panel will accept conventional 1/4in standard peg-board hooks as well as Wall Control's patented and secure slotted pegboard hooks and accessories. The Black Metal Pegboard features a long lasting and attractive baked-on powder-coat finish. The Pegboard Panel Includes (1) 32in x 16in Black Metal Pegboard Tool Board Panel with Mounting Hardware and Instructions. Made in USA.
feature_bullets: More than 10 times stronger than conventional pegboard
Metal pegboard panels accept slotted, stable, and more secure hooks, pegs, brackets, and shelves
Metal panel prevents the pegboard holes from fraying and wearing out over time
Pre-Formed Metal Pegboard Flange seperates panel face from Wall
Pegboard mounts directly to wall or stud with no framework required

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars178 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
